thread.title: Olympics close on sour note for Russia, North Korea

title: Olympics close on sour note for Russia, North Korea
text:
Olympics close on sour note for Russia, North Korea 5:15am EST - 01:54 
The closing ceremony for the Pyeongchang winter Olympics comes as defiant Russian athletes are embroiled in yet another doping scandal and overtures of Korean unity are placed against fresh U.S. sanctions for the North. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The closing ceremony for the Pyeongchang winter Olympics comes as defiant Russian athletes are embroiled in yet another doping scandal and overtures of Korean unity are placed against fresh U.S. sanctions for the North.
